snippet: The Night of the Stars charity game at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London last month featured a Who’s Who of British bridge stars.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the Night of the Stars charity game at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London.
lead_paragraph: The Night of the Stars charity game at the Wimbledon Bridge Club in London last month featured a Who’s Who of British bridge stars.

headline.seo: Night of the Stars Charity Match at Wimbledon Bridge Club
headline.main: Taking a ‘Softly, Softly’ Tack at London’s Night of the Stars
headline.print_headline: Taking a ‘Softly, Softly’ Tack At London’s Night of the Stars
